chapter: There are two coalitions involved in the Plastics Treaty
The first is the High Ambition Coalition
The second is the Like Minded Group
These countries haven't explicitly joined the HAC but, because the EU votes as a block, they are implicitly aligned with the HAC
If we count the number of countries in each group...
